people started gathering around after that .

output.sentences: The protest was armed with reporters aiming cameras ready for the event.
The peace didn't last long once people started gathering.
Various protesters in the crowd took a few swings from some of the police.
The cops seemed a bit crazy to do this to peaceful protesters.
In that moment everyone including the first lady, stood speechless and somber.
